Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY ANY MENOTEK PRODUCTS
Reviews.Author: dale dickerson
Reviews.Content: I am on my 3rd (2 replacements) and all three are defective. Especially the audio channel. I would rather have the Videosecu brand. No problems with any of those.

Reviews.Title: would buy alot more down the road
Reviews.Author: roush family
Reviews.Content: we both love it for are cctv camera  and it works just fine between the cctv camare and tv really good

Reviews.Title: Solid CCTV cable - Good value for the dollar!
Reviews.Author: Steven Leong
Reviews.Content: Needed an extended length cable for my CCTV installation and this vendor and cable proved to be the best value out on the web.  Working AOK!

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: Even tough it was 150 ft worked fine with the video resolution. The signal interference or cut outs in between
